New Records: David Miller scored a match-winning 59 from 46 deliveries
South Africa's bowlers, led by Lungi Ngidi and Wayne Parnell, took key wickets to restrict India's total
Key Match Events: South Africa secured a five-wicket victory with just two balls to spare
David Miller's crucial boundary and four in the final over turned the game in South Africa's favor
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to bat first but faced early collapse after losing Rohit Sharma early
South Africa recovered from a slow start after losing two quick wickets
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa moved to the top of Group Two in the Super 12 stage
The match was a significant win for South Africa in the tournament
